  16.0pt;font-family:"Lantinghei SC Demibold",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
  "Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Demibold";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Lantinghei SC Demibold";color:#3D4450;mso-font-kerning:0pt">人之间有语言的交流还有一系列的信号传达信息，那么机器之间也有他们的语言，然而系统之间的工作也是靠互相通信才能完美的工作，那么就让我们看看其中的一种机制</span></b><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica",sans-serif;
  mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  color:#3D4450;mso-font-kerning:0pt">——</span></b><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Lantinghei SC Demibold",sans-serif;
  mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Demibold";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Demibold";color:#3D4450;mso-font-kerning:
  0pt">消息机制。</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
  "Helvetica",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: black; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Lantinghei SC Demibold",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Demibold";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Demibold";color:white;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">从一个剧情开始</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
"Helvetica",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:white;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:7.5pt;text-indent:12.0pt;line-height:
17.25pt;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;background:white"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Helvetica;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3D4450;mso-font-kerning:0pt">路遥的《平凡的世界》因为翻拍成电视剧，又再次火起来了！我们就从这里开始吧，其小说是以这样一个场景开头的：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3D4450;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#C7254E;background:#F9F2F4;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">在一个半山腰县立高中的大院坝里，在一个校园内的南墙根下，按班级排起了十几个纵队的年轻男女，各班的值日生正忙碌地给众人分发饭菜</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#C7254E;background:#F9F2F4;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">…… </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#C7254E;background:#F9F2F4;mso-font-kerning:0pt">菜分为甲、乙、丙三等，甲菜以土豆、白菜、粉条为主，还有可人大肉片，乙菜没有肉，丙菜只有清水煮白萝卜。主食也分为三等：白面馍，玉米面馍，高粱面馍，白、黄、黑分别学生代表了三种差别，学生们戏称欧洲、亚洲、非洲。每个人的饭菜都是昨天登记好并付了饭票的，在这一长长的队伍中自然以光景较好的富家子弟排在最前，光景一般的随后，而那些家庭贫困少吃缺穿的只能在其他学生走后才姗姗来迟</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#C7254E;background:#F9F2F4;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">……</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3D4450;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:7.5pt;text-indent:12.0pt;line-height:
17.25pt;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:

0pt">消息从何而来</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica",sans-serif;

0pt">诺依曼的体系结构计算机有运算器、存储器、控制器和输入设备和输出设备五大部件组成，消息主要来自输入设备，如键盘、鼠标、扫描仪等，也可来自已窗口和操作系统。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica",sans-serif;

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:7.5pt;text-indent:12.0pt;line-height:

16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Helvetica;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3D4450;mso-font-kerning:0pt">消息队列就是存放消息的一种队列，具有先进先出的特点。每产生一个消息都会添加进消息队列中，在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3D4450;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Window</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3D4450;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">中消息队列是在操作系统中定义的。消息队列就如同一群排队打饭的少男少女，这群人中光景较好的排在前面，光景较差的排在后面，可以理解成是一种优先级队列！要想更多的了解队列的相关知识，可参见队列。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3D4450;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3D4450;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">消息循环就是通过循环</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
"Helvetica",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3D4450;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">(</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3D4450;mso-font-kerning:0pt">如</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3D4450;mso-font-kerning:0pt">while)</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Helvetica;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3D4450;mso-font-kerning:0pt">不断地从消息队列中取得队首的消息，并将消息分发出去。类似于上面的例子中分发饭菜值日生。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3D4450;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3D4450;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">消息处理就是在接收到消息之后根据不同的消息类型做出不同的处理。上面例子中值日生根据学生不同类型的饭票给他们不同等级的饭菜就是消息处理，学生手中的饭票就是消息所携带的信息。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3D4450;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3D4450;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">事件是根据接收到的消息的具体信息做出的特定的处理，放在代码中是事件响应函数。上面的例子中学生拿到饭菜后吃饭就是具体的事件。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3D4450;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

break;<br>
}<br>

Message msg = new Message(this, msgType, msgInfo);<br>
try {<br>
msgQueue.put(msg); //</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Lantinghei SC Demibold",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";

"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
} catch (InterruptedException e) {<br>
e.printStackTrace();<br>
}<br>
}<br>
}<o:p></o:p></span></p>

switch(msg.getType()) {<br>

break;<br>
default:<br>
onSysEvent(msg);<br>
}<br>
